returnValueDescriptions.contextValue: The value to be passed to the TabListProvider above all the tabs.
returnValueDescriptions.getRootProps: Resolver for the root slot's props.
returnValueDescriptions.highlightedValue: The value of the currently highlighted tab.
returnValueDescriptions.isRtl: If true, it will indicate that the text's direction in right-to-left.
returnValueDescriptions.selectedValue: The value of the currently selected tab.
